statements: SELECT * FROM feedback_and_reviews_from_fashion_show;
SELECT reviewer_name, rating FROM feedback_and_reviews_from_fashion_show WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT id, reviewer_name, review_text FROM feedback_and_reviews_from_fashion_show WHERE is_press_review = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM feedback_and_reviews_from_fashion_show ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT reviewer_name, review_text FROM feedback_and_reviews_from_fashion_show WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM feedback_and_reviews_from_fashion_show WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT reviewer_name, rating FROM feedback_and_reviews_from_fashion_show WHERE is_press_review = TRUE;
SELECT id, reviewer_name, review_text FROM feedback_and_reviews_from_fashion_show ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_and_reviews_from_fashion_show WHERE review_text LIKE '%amazing%';
SELECT COUNT(reviewer_name) AS total_reviews, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM feedback_and_reviews_from_fashion_show;
SELECT * FROM PressFeedback
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_rating FROM PressFeedback
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_rating FROM AttendeeFeedback
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, feedback_rating FROM PressFeedback WHERE feedback_rating > 3
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, feedback_rating FROM AttendeeFeedback WHERE attendee_id = 100
SELECT * FROM PressFeedback ORDER BY feedback_rating DESC, feedback_text ASC;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_rating FROM AttendeeFeedback WHERE feedback_rating > 3;
SELECT DISTINCT feedback_rating FROM PressFeedback;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM PressFeedback WHERE feedback_id > 10 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT attendee_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM AttendeeFeedback GROUP BY attendee_id HAVING total_feedback > 2;
SELECT * FROM PressFeedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM AttendeeFeedback;
SELECT event_id, attendees_count FROM EventMetrics ORDER BY attendees_count DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM PressFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM AttendeeFeedback WHERE attendee_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM PressFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM AttendeeFeedback ORDER BY attendee_id DESC;
SELECT event_id, attendees_count FROM EventMetrics WHERE overall_rating >= 4.5;
SELECT feedback_id, comments, event_rating FROM AttendeeFeedback WHERE event_rating BETWEEN 3 AND 5 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM PressFeedback WHERE rating < 2 OR rating > 4 ORDER BY rating ASC;
SELECT * FROM FeedbackFromPress;
SELECT id, press_name, rating FROM FeedbackFromAttendees ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT id, event_date, total_attendees FROM EventMetrics WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_attendees DESC;
SELECT * FROM FeedbackFromPress WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT id, suggestion_text FROM ImprovementSuggestions;
SELECT * FROM FeedbackFromPress LIMIT 5;
SELECT press_name, feedback_text FROM FeedbackFromPress WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM EventMetrics ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT attendee_id, feedback_text FROM FeedbackFromAttendees WHERE rating < 3 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT press_name, feedback_text, rating FROM FeedbackFromPress JOIN FeedbackFromAttendees ON FeedbackFromPress.id = FeedbackFromAttendees.id;
SELECT * FROM press_feedback;
SELECT organization, feedback FROM attendee_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT event_id, total_attendees FROM event_stats ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT organization, contact_info FROM press_contact WHERE press_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT event_id, photo_url FROM event_photos LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM press_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT organization, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM press_feedback GROUP BY organization HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT event_date, total_attendees, total_press FROM event_stats WHERE total_attendees > 100 AND total_press < 5;
SELECT press_name, organization, contact_info FROM press_contact WHERE organization = 'TechNews' ORDER BY press_name ASC;
SELECT attendee_name, feedback FROM attendee_feedback WHERE feedback ILIKE '%excellent%' AND rating = 5 ORDER BY attendee_name ASC;
